00053 /*-- external representation added to MCSTD ------------------------*/
00054 
00055 INLINE void came_cn(int *ext, const int b, const int c, const int n, const int a)
00056 {
00057    *ext = (b << 24 | (c << 16) | (n << 8) | a);
00058 }
00059 
00060 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00061 INLINE void came_ext(const int ext, int *b, int *c, int *n, int *a)
00062 {
00063    *b = (ext >> 24) & 0x7;
00064    *c = (ext >> 16) & 0x7;
00065    *n = (ext >> 8) & 0x1f;
00066    *a = (ext >> 0) & 0xf;
00067 }
00068

00070 *  ESONE functions                                                   *
00071 *********************************************************************/

00085 INLINE void ccinit(void)
00086 {
00087    cam_init();
00088 }
00089 
00090 /********************************************************************/
00099 INLINE int fccinit(void)
00100 {
00101    if (cam_init() == SUCCESS)
00102       return 1;
00103 
00104    return 0;
00105 }

00107 /********************************************************************/
00122 INLINE void cdreg(int *ext, const int b, const int c, const int n, const int a)
00123 {
00124    came_cn(ext, b, c, n, a);
00125 }
00126 
00127 /********************************************************************/
00143 INLINE void cssa(const int f, int ext, unsigned short *d, int *q)
00144 {
00145    int b, c, n, a, x;
00146 
00147    if (f < 8) {
00148       /* read */
00149       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00150       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, d, &x, q);
00151    } else if (f > 15) {
00152       /* write */
00153       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00154       cam16o_q(c, n, a, f, *d, &x, q);
00155    } else if ((f > 7) || (f > 23)) {
00156       /* command */
00157       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00158       camc_q(c, n, a, f, q);
00159    }
00160 }
00161 
00162 /********************************************************************/
00178 INLINE void cfsa(const int f, const int ext, unsigned long *d, int *q)
00179 {
00180    int b, c, n, a, x;
00181 
00182    if (f < 8) {
00183       /* read */
00184       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00185       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, d, &x, q);
00186    } else if (f > 15) {
00187       /* write */
00188       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00189       cam24o_q(c, n, a, f, *d, &x, q);
00190    } else if ((f > 7) || (f > 23)) {
00191       /* command */
00192       came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00193       camc_q(c, n, a, f, q);
00194    }
00195 }

00209

00211    cam_crate_clear(c);
00212 }

00241 INLINE void ccci(const int ext, int l)
00242 {
00243    int b, c, n, a;
00244 
00245    came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00246    if (l)
00247       cam_inhibit_set(c);
00248    else
00249       cam_inhibit_clear(c);
00250 }

00324 INLINE void cdlam(int *lam, const int b, const int c, const int n,
00325                   const int a, const int inta[2])
00326 {
00327    /* inta[2] ignored */
00328    cdreg(lam, b, c, n, a);

00341 INLINE void ctgl(const int ext, int *l)
00342 {
00343    int b, c, n, a;
00344    unsigned long lam;
00345 
00346    came_ext(ext, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00347    cam_lam_read(c, &lam);
00348    *l = (lam > 0);
00349 }

00351 /********************************************************************/
00361 INLINE void cclm(const int lam, int l)
00362 {
00363    int b, c, n, a;
00364 
00365    came_ext(lam, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00366 
00367    if (l)
00368       camc(c, n, 0, 26);
00369    else
00370       camc(c, n, 0, 24);
00371 }

00373 /********************************************************************/
00384 INLINE void cclnk(const int lam, void (*isr) (void))
00385 {
00386    int b, c, n, a;
00387 
00388    came_ext(lam, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00389 
00390    cam_interrupt_attach(c, n, isr);
00391    cam_lam_enable(c, n);
00392    cam_lam_clear(c, n);
00393 }

00407 
00408    came_ext(lam, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00409    cam_interrupt_detach(c, n);

00460 {

00467 /********************************************************************/
00480 INLINE void cfga(int f[], int exta[], int intc[], int qa[], int cb[])
00481 {
00482    int i;
00483 
00484    for (i = 0; i < cb[0]; i++)
00485       cfsa(f[i], exta[i], (unsigned long *) (&(intc[i])), &(qa[i]));
00486 
00487    cb[1] = cb[0];
00488 }
00489 
00490 /********************************************************************/
00503 INLINE void csga(int f[], int exta[], int intc[], int qa[], int cb[])
00504 {
00505    int i;
00506 
00507    for (i = 0; i < cb[0]; i++)
00508       cssa(f[i], exta[i], (unsigned short *) (&(intc[i])), &(qa[i]));
00509 
00510    cb[1] = cb[0];
00511 }
00512 
00513 /********************************************************************/
00534 INLINE void cfmad(int f, int extb[], int intc[], int cb[])
00535 {
00536    int j, count;
00537    int x, q, b, c, n, a;
00538    unsigned long exts, extc, exte;
00539 
00540    exts = extb[0];
00541    exte = extb[1];
00542    count = cb[0];
00543    j = 0;
00544    came_ext(exts, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00545    do {
00546       cam24i_q(c, n, a, f, (unsigned long *) &intc[j], &x, &q);
00547       if (q == 0) {
00548          a = 0;                 /* set subaddress to zero */
00549          n++;                   /* select next slot */
00550          j++;
00551       } else {
00552          a++;                   /* increment address */
00553          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00554          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00555          --count;
00556       }
00557       came_cn((int *) &extc, b, c, n, a);
00558 
00559       if (extc > exte)
00560          count = 0;             /* force exit */
00561 
00562    } while (count);
00563 }
00564 
00565 /********************************************************************/
00586 INLINE void csmad(int f, int extb[], int intc[], int cb[])
00587 {
00588    int j, count;
00589    int x, q, b, c, n, a;
00590    unsigned long exts, extc, exte;
00591 
00592    exts = extb[0];
00593    exte = extb[1];
00594    count = cb[0];
00595    j = 0;
00596    came_ext(exts, &b, &c, &n, &a);
00597    do {
00598       cam16i_q(c, n, a, f, (unsigned short *) &intc[j], &x, &q);
00599       if (q == 0) {
00600          a = 0;                 /* set subaddress to zero */
00601          n++;                   /* select next slot */
00602          j++;
00603       } else {
00604          a++;                   /* increment address */
00605          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00606          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00607          --count;
00608       }
00609       came_cn((int *) &extc, b, c, n, a);
00610 
00611       if (extc > exte)
00612          count = 0;             /* force exit */
00613 
00614    } while (count);
00615 }

00617 /********************************************************************/
00631 INLINE void cfubc(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00632 {
00633    int count, q;
00634 
00635    count = cb[0];
00636    do {
00637       cfsa(f, ext, (unsigned long *) intc, &q);
00638       if (q == 0)
00639          count = 0;             /* stop on no q */
00640       else {
00641          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00642          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00643          --count;
00644       }
00645    } while (count);
00646 }
00647 
00648 /********************************************************************/
00662 INLINE void csubc(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00663 {
00664    int count, q;
00665 
00666    count = cb[0];
00667    do {
00668       cssa(f, ext, (unsigned short *) intc, &q);
00669       if (q == 0)
00670          count = 0;             /* stop on no q */
00671       else {
00672          ++cb[1];               /* increment tally count */
00673          ++intc;                /* next data array */
00674          --count;
00675       }
00676    } while (count);
00677 }

00679 /********************************************************************/
00694 INLINE void cfubr(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
00695 {
00696    int q, count;
00697 
00698    count = cb[0];
00699    do {
00700       do {
00701          cfsa(f, ext, (unsigned long *) intc, &q);
00702       } while (q == 0);
00703 
00704       ++cb[1];                  /* increment tally count */
00705       ++intc;                   /* next data array */
00706       --count;
00707    } while (count);
00708 }

00725 INLINE void csubr(const int f, int ext, int intc[], int cb[])
